function ERI_EP04_14()
    --.承-5【11月第4週】「暗雲」
    SaveData.Title = "暗雲"

    --//BG：和室
    LAYER_LOAD(LAYER_BG, "BG022aa")
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000" , 1000,false)

PLAY_BGM("BGM02.wav")

LAYER_LOAD_FACE("BU_ERI01ca")
PLAY_VOICE("erika_1126.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Erika】Surprised
 "Is it true that Daria-san and I are completely tied, each with 50% of the votes?" ]])
LAYER_LOAD_FACE("")

    MSG([[ A week had passed in the blink of an eye since the Princess Election was announced, and as November was drawing to a close — it turned out that the approval ratings were surprisingly evenly matched. ]])

    --//BU：リラ（笑顔）、ウラン（驚き）
    LAYER_LOAD(50,"BU_RIR07eb")
    LAYER_LOAD(55,"BU_RYU01ca")
    LAYER_POSITION(50,-400,0)
    LAYER_POSITION(55,400,0)
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000",500,true)

    MSG([[ Lira-san, who came to deliver the news, laughed at my flustered state before explaining the situation in detail. ]])

PLAY_VOICE("lira_0492.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Lira】Smile
 "It's info from a reliable source, so there's no mistake. At this rate, you've totally got a shot at winning." ]])

    LAYER_LOAD(55,"BU_RYU01aa")
    LAYER_POSITION(55,400,0)
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000",300,true)

PLAY_VOICE("uran_0325.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Uran】Normal
 "Currently, my faction is supporting Erika-san. Hermes-sama’s faction is backing Daria-san." ]])

    LAYER_LOAD(55,"BU_RYU01da")
    LAYER_POSITION(55,400,0)
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000",300,true)

PLAY_VOICE("uran_0326.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Uran】Sad
 "Normally, the size of the factions should directly reflect the vote share, so why are they so evenly matched?" ]])

    MSG([[ Uran-san’s point was correct. I had heard that the Himegami sisters’ faction made up about 60% of the entire student body. ]])

    MSG([[ Yet, it was hard to believe that I alone had managed to gain 50% support. ]])

    LAYER_LOAD(50,"BU_RIR07ia")
    LAYER_POSITION(50,-400,0)
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000",300,true)

PLAY_VOICE("lira_0493.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Lira】Wink
 "That rumor everyone's been talking about is working perfectly~" ]])

LAYER_LOAD_FACE("BU_ERI01ca")
PLAY_VOICE("erika_1127.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Erika】Surprised
 "You mean that rumor about me and Daria-san fighting over Hermes-san—that love triangle story?" ]])
LAYER_LOAD_FACE("")

PLAY_VOICE("lira_0494.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Lira】Wink
 "Y-yeah. Manga, dramas, movies, novels—those intense mismatched love stories always heat things up, right?" ]])

    MSG([[ Uran-san nodded vigorously. I don’t watch or read romance stories at all, so I didn’t fully get it, but I nodded along anyway. ]])

    LAYER_LOAD(50,"BU_RIR07aa")
    LAYER_POSITION(50,-400,0)
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000",300,true)

PLAY_VOICE("lira_0495.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Lira】Normal
 "For those who believe that rumor, Erika is now the tragic heroine suffering over her forbidden love for a senior from a different social class." ]])

    LAYER_LOAD(50,"BU_RIR07eb")
    LAYER_POSITION(50,-400,0)
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000",300,true)

PLAY_VOICE("lira_0496.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Lira】Smile
 "If she can’t win the next Princess Election, she’ll be torn apart from her beloved Hermes-senpai! What will she do?! That’s the vibe!" ]])

PLAY_VOICE("lira_0497.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Lira】Smile
 "That’s why even some girls within the Himegami sister faction are starting to root for Erika." ]])

    LAYER_LOAD(50,"BU_RIR07ea")
    LAYER_POSITION(50,-400,0)
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000",300,true)

PLAY_VOICE("lira_0498.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Lira】Smile
 "Forbidden sisterly love is okay, but mismatched romance is way more exciting. Yo! The Romeo and Juliet of Yuriai Private Academy!" ]])

LAYER_LOAD_FACE("BU_ERI01fc")
PLAY_VOICE("erika_1128.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Erika】Wry smile
 "Th-that’s totally nothing like the truth, though." ]])
LAYER_LOAD_FACE("")

    LAYER_LOAD(50,"BU_RIR07eb")
    LAYER_POSITION(50,-400,0)
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000",300,true)

PLAY_VOICE("lira_0499.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Lira】Smile
 "But the story spreading around is more fun. Honestly, the truth doesn’t really matter. That’s how rumors work." ]])

    MSG([[ I remembered the trunk-closing photo scandal when wild and ridiculous rumors were flying everywhere. ]])

    MSG([[ Indeed, regardless of the facts, the stories that spread tend to be those rich in entertainment value. ]])

    MSG([[ Maybe most people are less concerned with the reality and more interested in how the story ultimately plays out. ]])

    LAYER_LOAD(50,"BU_RIR07aa")
    LAYER_POSITION(50,-400,0)
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000",300,true)

PLAY_VOICE("lira_0500.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Lira】Normal
 "Anyway, Daria-paisen hasn’t shown any noticeable moves, so it looks like you might win at this rate. Keep it up, yeah!" ]])

    LAYER_LOAD(55,"BU_RYU01da")
    LAYER_POSITION(55,400,0)
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000",300,true)

PLAY_VOICE("uran_0327.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Uran】Sad
 "The fact that Daria-san shows no signs of action is worrying." ]])

LAYER_LOAD_FACE("BU_ERI01ba")
PLAY_VOICE("erika_1129.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Erika】Serious
 "...Yes. I’m sure there’s something going on." ]])
LAYER_LOAD_FACE("")

    MSG([[ While we continued canvassing in each classroom and handing out flyers, steadily pushing forward our campaign, there was no movement at all from Daria-san’s faction. ]])

    MSG([[ Even the rumors, which spread with content unfavorable to Daria-san, hadn’t provoked any action from her as a disciplinary committee member. ]])

    MSG([[ As the head of the disciplinary committee, Daria-san should be capable of altering rumors to her advantage... but she didn't. ]])

    LAYER_LOAD(50,"BU_RIR07aa")
    LAYER_POSITION(50,-400,0)
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000",300,true)

PLAY_VOICE("lira_0501.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Lira】Normal
 "Maybe she thinks there’s no need to panic and act just yet?" ]])

PLAY_VOICE("lira_0502.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Lira】Normal
 "It’s hard to believe that Daria-paisen hasn’t prepared any strategy. She must have some plan to win, surely." ]])

LAYER_LOAD_FACE("BU_ERI01ba")
PLAY_VOICE("erika_1130.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Erika】Serious
 "Daria-san’s strategy... for example, rewriting the rumors at the last minute?" ]])
LAYER_LOAD_FACE("")

    LAYER_LOAD(55,"BU_RYU01aa")
    LAYER_POSITION(55,400,0)
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000",300,true)

PLAY_VOICE("uran_0328.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Uran】Normal
 "At that point, it would definitely be too late. Rumors become accepted as fact the longer they circulate." ]])

PLAY_VOICE("lira_0503.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Lira】Normal
 "Then, what if she’s absolutely confident in her campaign theme?" ]])

PLAY_VOICE("lira_0504.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Lira】Normal
 "You know, the Princess Election always announces a theme that unwrittenly favors the challenger, right?" ]])

PLAY_VOICE("lira_0505.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Lira】Normal
 "What if she already knows what it is and can see her victory?" ]])

PLAY_VOICE("uran_0329.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Uran】Normal
 "...I see. That possibility can’t be ruled out." ]])

PLAY_VOICE("uran_0330.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Uran】Normal
 "If there’s one thing Daria-san is absolutely confident in, it's a single performance piece. We must start countermeasures immediately." ]])

LAYER_LOAD_FACE("BU_ERI01ca")
PLAY_VOICE("erika_1131.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Erika】Surprised
 "W-what is that theme?" ]])
LAYER_LOAD_FACE("")

    MSG([[ After Uran-san finished explaining something to her attendant, she clearly announced the theme— ]])

    LAYER_LOAD(55,"BU_RYU01da")
    LAYER_POSITION(55,400,0)
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000",300,true)

PLAY_VOICE("uran_0331.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Uran】Sad
 "It is martial arts. Daria-san has won twice before in the Princess Election by performing martial arts." ]])

PLAY_VOICE("uran_0332.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Uran】Sad
 "There is likely no one at Yuriai Private Academy who can rival her skill. She is that absolutely formidable." ]])

LAYER_LOAD_FACE("BU_ERI01ga")
PLAY_VOICE("erika_1132.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Erika】Anxious
 "Martial arts." ]])
LAYER_LOAD_FACE("")

    MSG([[ That is also a welcome theme for me. ]])

    MSG([[ However, when it came to memories tied to Daria-san and martial arts, there was one unforgettable episode— ]])

    LAYER_LOAD(50,"")
    LAYER_LOAD(55,"")

    --　　　　◆
STOP_BGM(1000)
    LAYER_LOAD(LAYER_BG, "BG000aa")
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000" , 1000,false)
    WAIT_INPUT(1000)


    ScenarioManager.Next("ERI_EP04_15")
end
